description: Manages NICs and secondary IPs of an instance on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

vm_guest_ip.description: Secondary IP address to be added to the instance nic. If not set, the API always returns a new IP address and idempotency is not given.

domain.description: Domain the instance is related to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

network.description: Name of the network. Required to find the NIC if instance has multiple networks assigned.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the instance is deployed in.

vpc.description: Name of the VPC the C(vm) is related to.

account.description: Account the instance is related to.

zone.description: Name of the zone in which the instance is deployed in. If not set, default zone is used.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.
